Wish I had one of your boxes, Frank, they are the best, what I'd like is  
=
one that could use electric as well as battery, that way I could save the  =

battery, they work best with electric anyway.  What ever happened to the  =

Frank's Box, that Sharon had?  It was a great box, with great sound, and I=
  have 
this bigger Aiwa, I'd like you to fix Frank, let me know when you c=
an take  
it?  I have no idea how to turn it into a spirit box. sf
 
 
In a=
 message dated 11/14/2011 1:34:33 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
purplealien=
girl@... writes:

 
 
 
You gotta be freaking kidding!!! My random mo=
de is smoothly changing  
voltage that slowly and smoothly changes value- r=
andomly. It looks almost like  
DC on a scope. This crap in the vid, that w=
ould be useless for a sweep, you'd 
 get nothing but buzzing from a radio.
=

Go ask Chris Moon about his  little blue box, which he has had since, 2006=
 
I think, and other larger units  before that.. ALL RANDOM SWEEP, all work=
 
every time it's turned on. Yet these  jerkfucks would have everyone belie=
ve 
everything I make is pure shit, plus how  they invented it first.

I ra=
n into problems trying to make the RVG run  single ended, as in a 
single p=
ower supply--instead of needing 16 batteries to  run--only 8 required for 
=
single ended. Y'll better step back and check your  facts! Then, put a vid =

of useless random noise--WTF is that crap!?

What  makes it worse, this gr=
oup been around since I don't rememeber, 
between 2004  and 2006, and yet n=
o one stands up and says my boxes came long 
before Hultay,  long before Ch=
apple, before Moon ripped it off and claimed it as 
Edison's  Telephone To =
The Dead. Even the owner of this group that watched 
how Chapple  would joi=
n the group under one name, quit the group, then come 
back under  another =
name, she don't stand up and say how my shit came first. 

And  why do I th=
ink everyone in the so called paranromal seeks only fame 
and  fotune, just=
 making a name for themselves where no proof is required, no  
credentials,=
 all one has to do is proclaim how great they are, and how 
useless  everyo=
ne else is

Yeah, done here. Useless to debate to with criminal  minds!

F-=
S
